<title level="1" right="Hazard 4" pfs="">[Scythe Blades](/Hazards.aspx?ID=480)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

Two blades, each hidden in a 15-foot-long ceiling groove, are both connected to a trip wire.

---

**Stealth**
DC 23 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 21 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) (trained) to disable each blade

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 21, **Fort** +12, **Ref** +8

**Hardness**
11

**HP**
44 (BT 22)

**Immunities**
[critical hits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2190), [object immunities](/Rules.aspx?ID=2161), precision damage

</column>

**Falling Scythes** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The trip wire is pulled or severed; **Effect** Both blades swing down, each one [Striking](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) all creatures under the ceiling grooves. 

**Melee** scythe +17 ([deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=570)), **Damage** 2d12+4 slashing; no multiple attack penalty

---
**Reset**
The trap resets after 15 minutes.
